I received a flu vaccine in the past, do I still 
need this vaccine?
Y es. If you received a flu vaccine in the past, 
you still need to get the flu vaccine. Flu 
protection only lasts for one flu season, so 
it is important to get vaccinated every flu 
season. The vaccine available from this autumn
